entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 22 December 2020

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 22 December 2020

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
